summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 LINCOLN MKZ. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V384000 (AIR BAGS) FOR THE PASSENGER FRONTAL AIR BAG INFLATOR;  HOWEVER, THE PARTS TO DO THE REPAIR WERE UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE LOCAL DEALER (FORD LINCOLN OF OCALA) WAS CONTACTED AT 352-732-4800 ON TWO OCCASIONS IN THE FALL OF 2016 AND SPRING OF 2017. THE DEALER STATED THAT THEY DID NOT HAVE THE RECALL REMEDY PARTS AVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT THE PARTS FOR THE RECALL REMEDY WERE NOT MADE AVAILABLE, AND THAT THE CONTACT WOULD RECEIVE ANOTHER LETTER WHEN THEY ARRIVE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
